name: Ebix
overview: Ebix, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides software and e-commerce solutions for the insurance industry primarily in North America, Australia, New Zealand, India, and Singapore. It focuses on the sale, customization, development, implementation, and support of insurance carrier system platforms. The companyâ€™s platforms include Infinity Systems and Business Reinsurance and Insurance Company System (BRICS). Its Infinity Systems platform is an integrated and client server technology policy and claims administration system designed for small to medium sized property and casualty insurers. The companyâ€™s BRICS platform is a carrier management system that includes various modules, such as policy management, claims administration, underwriting, rating, and general ledger. It also sells and supports broker/agency management systems, including EbixASP, a Web-enabled system for insurance agencies to manage their businesses; eGlobal, a multi-lingual/multi-currency agency management software product; and Winbeat, a self hosted broker system. In addition, the company focuses on the expansion of connectivity between consumers, agents, carriers, and third party providers, through its exchange family of products in the life, health, annuity, and property and casualty sectors; and provision of business process outsourcing services, which comprise certificate origination, certificate tracking, call center, and back office support. It was formerly known as Delphi Systems, Inc. and changed its name to Ebix, Inc. in December 2003.
